LanguageData.PortableDetonatorRange.label: Detonator range
LanguageData.PortableDetonatorRange.description: How far the signal from a portable detonator will reach. Further is better, until you blow up something you didn't mean to.
LanguageData.PortableDetonatorNumUses.label: Detonator activations
LanguageData.PortableDetonatorNumUses.description: How many times a portable detonator can be activated before the battery runs dry.
